preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 220 g of Bismuth Oxide using a digital scale. 
 2. Weigh 10 g of Praseodymium Oxide and 10 g of Samarium Oxide. 
 3. Weigh 180 g of Titanium Dioxide. 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured powders. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform consistency is achieved, ensuring no clumps remain.
